scripts.cms:translations:apply: bash -c 'set -euo pipefail; : ${API_BASE:?set API_BASE}; : ${ADMIN_JWT:?set ADMIN_JWT}; curl -s -H "Authorization: Bearer $ADMIN_JWT" "$API_BASE/api/admin/cms/translations" > translations.json.tmp && jq -s ".[0] * .[1]" translations.json.tmp new_translations.json > merged_translations.json && curl -X PUT -H "Authorization: Bearer $ADMIN_JWT" -H "Content-Type: application/json" --data @merged_translations.json "$API_BASE/api/admin/cms/translations" && rm -f translations.json.tmp'
